p: It can be seen that geographical origin affects the chemical Constituents of EO. In 2011, the effect of different isolation methods on the quantity and quality of EOs of flowers, stems and leaves of A.orientalis was investigated. Methods used in this study included hydrodistillation method (HD), head-space solid-phase microextraction (HS-SPME), and microwave assisted head-space solid-phase microextraction (MA-HS-SPME) ( Torabbeigi et al., 2013). Hydrodistillation method was used in previous studies on A. orientalis essential oil ( Mazloomifar et al., 2003).
